subject: tested the difference between  fm & am sweeps under exactly the same conditions
author: bhali333
full_text:
hey guy's,

just finished going over results from a back to back fm and am sweep

I wanted to judge the results from both bands under the same conditions 
here are a couple of files from each. I'll mark the files am or fm at 
the begginning of the title. let me know what you think.

bruce
